page.title: 16A Hunton Girl's Spare Time
page.content: Tuesday is my busiest day. It begins when my alarm wakens me and the radio goes on automatically. I like Radio 1 best and listen to it most mornings. Some of my friends play games on their computers before school. Others watch breakfast TV or play with toys. After 3.30,lessons done, I play with my sisters then watch my favourite TV programme 'Beat the Teacher.'At 5.30 I go to Crakehall Brownies with Tawny Owl and five other Hunton girls. I am an elf. I like working for badges. By 7p.m. we have arrived at Hunton Institute Youth Club. Children of all ages go. We raise money for games and sports equipment by sponsored walks. Our new trampolette is ACE! I have fun playing rounders against other clubs. I go to bed at 8.30 but I usually read an Enid Blyton book which helps me to get to sleep.
